revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - Accept. See Sosin's comments. Line 2 -> [ca.34]. Delete line 2bis and insert its text in line 3 (as in the comments), before Kόμωνί τινι. Line 4 -> [ca.35]. Delete line 3bis and insert it in line 4, after γένωμαι. Line 5 -> [ca.40]. Line 6 -> [ca.45]. Delete line 6bis and insert its text in line 7, after ἐνταῦθα. Line 7, <:μ̣.6[.3]|alt|μ̣ὴ̣ ἕ̣ν̣ τ̣ι̣ δ̣ρ̣α̣σ̣μ̣ῶ̣ι̣:> (see comments). Line 10 -> [.20]. Line 12 -> [.13]. Line 13 -> [.25].

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Passim: combine gaps (e.g. [.5] [.5] --> [.10] vel sim); top --> 1. ----; lin4--> μέχρις; lin7 ἀ̣π̣᾿ --> ἀ̣π’̣; lin8 παρ᾿ --> παρ'; lin11-12--> <:[.6].1 11.- .1ω̣ς .2[.6].1σ̣παρε̣[.1]υ̣.1[.2].1o|alt:|[.5] [ο]ὕ̣11.- τ̣ω̣ς ἀ̣ε̣[ὶ ἡμ]ᾶ̣ς̣ παρε̣[μ]υ̣θ̣[εῖ]τ̣ο(?):> ; lin11--> τ̣ὸ̣ν̣ [.?]
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.ammon;1;22' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.ammon;2;33'
Entered text of P.Ammon II 33 from digital copy proofread against print edition. The preview shows a problem with the double angle brackets of interlinear lines 2bis and 6bis.
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
